longinst: In this test, you need to draw the face of a clock. You will start by placing the numbers at the correct locations on the clock. Then, you will be asked to place the hands of the clock at a specific time.  If you make a mistake, continue forward and try to draw the rest of the clock accurately. Click the mouse button to begin.
inst1: Place the number at the correct location on the clock
inst2: If you make a mistake, place it as close as you can
inst1b: Click to place [<VAL>]  at the correct location on the clock
inst1c: This is where you placed the numbers.
inst1d: The correct time is ten past eleven.
inst2d: Click on a number to place the HOUR hand
inst2e: Click on a number to place the MINUTE hand
